text: Mıgırdiç Margosyan (23 December 1938 – 2 April 2022) was a Turkish-Armenian writer. Margosyan published many short stories in Armenian at the Marmara newspaper. Margosyan published Gavur Mahallesi (1992), Söyle Margos Nerelisen? (1995) and Biletimiz İstanbul'a Kesildi (1998) in Turkish and in 1999 published his second book, Dikrisi Aperen in Armenian. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Turkish writers Category:Armenian writers Category:People from Diyarbakır Province
